Description.Title: SoilTemperature (APSIM Next Generation)
Description.Authors: APSIM Initiative (Eric Zurcher, John Hargreaves, Val Snow, Dean Holzworth)
Description.Institution: APSIM Initiative (CSIRO, The University of Queensland, AgResearch, and partners)
Description.ExtendedDescription: APSIM’s SoilTemperature component simulates sub-daily heat fluxes and temperatures from the soil surface through the soil profile. It represents the profile using nodes (including an atmospheric node, a surface node, layer-centre nodes, and several phantom nodes below the profile) and solves the 1-D heat diffusion using a tri-diagonal (Thomas) algorithm with a configurable differencing coefficient (nu). Thermal properties are computed from soil constituents (minerals, organic matter, water, air, etc.) and soil state (water content, bulk density), drawing on formulations largely based on Campbell (1985). The model iterates through intra-day time steps (default 48 per day), computes net radiation (short- and long-wave) and an atmospheric boundary layer conductance with stability corrections, and updates surface and layer temperatures along with daily min/avg/max diagnostics. It links to APSIM weather, soil physical, organic matter, and soil water components (including albedo, evaporation, and canopy height from MicroClimate/SoilWater). References: Campbell, G.S. (1985) Soil Physics with BASIC. See APSIM Next Generation repository and documentation for broader model context: https://github.com/APSIMInitiative/ApsimX and https://apsimnextgeneration.netlify.app/
Description.ShortDescription: A sub-daily soil heat flow and temperature profile model (APSIM NG) based on Campbell (1985), with radiative and convective surface exchange and Thomas-scheme solution.

Input.name: initial_values
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperatures per soil node (starting at topsoil node)

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Optional instrument (wind) height; if <= 0 uses default

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Source for boundary layer conductance: 'calc' or 'constant'

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Node depths including phantom and air/surface nodes

Input.name: thermCondPar1
Input.description: Campbell thermal conductivity coefficient C1 per element/node

Input.name: thermCondPar2
Input.description: Campbell thermal conductivity coefficient C2 per element/node

Input.name: thermCondPar3
Input.description: Campbell thermal conductivity coefficient C3 per element/node

Input.name: thermCondPar4
Input.description: Campbell thermal conductivity coefficient C4 per element/node

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat per node (mapped to nodes)

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperatures at nodes (includes air and surface nodes)

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures near 5 AM

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Heat storage term per node for solver

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Thermal conductivity at nodes (air node stores boundary-layer value)

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Working array for updated node temperatures

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature (for diurnal interpolation)

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Soil water content profile including phantom nodes

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily average soil temperature per node (accumulated)

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rock fraction profile including phantom layers

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon profile including phantom layers

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand fraction profile including phantom layers

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt fraction profile including phantom layers

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay fraction profile including phantom layers

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument height used during process (updated to be >= canopy+0.5 m)

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height used during process (in meters)

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation at soil surface (carried between timesteps)

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Hour of day for maximum temperature (local solar time)

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily minimum soil temperatures per node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily maximum soil temperatures per node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily average soil temperatures per node

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Average boundary layer conductance proxy for the day

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Thermal conductivity at nodes (air node stores boundary-layer value)

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: New node temperatures after solver step

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation at last sub-daily step

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated soil water content profile (mutated in-place)

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns volumetric specific heat (MJ/m3/K) for a soil constituent.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns thermal conductance for a constituent (overwritten to volumetricSpecificHeat as per original).

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Computes shape factor for constituents (returns volumetricSpecificHeat as per original).

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volume fraction of rocks.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volume fraction of organic matter from carbon and bulk density.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volume fraction of sand.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volume fraction of silt.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volume fraction of clay.

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volume fraction of water adjusted for organic matter.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volume fraction of ice (returns 0).

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volume fraction of air as residual.

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes Campbell thermal conductivity coefficients C1..C4.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat per node and maps to nodes.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes thermal conductivity per node and maps to nodes.

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps layer-centered values to nodes via weighted averaging.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Tri-diagonal solver for heat diffusion with surface/bottom boundary conditions.

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Interpolates diurnal air temperature.

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Updates daily min/max/average temps and boundary layer conductance; copies new to old.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Computes boundary layer conductance from Monin–Obukhov similarity with radiative term.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan–Boltzmann law.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Initialises soil temperature profile from seasonal sinusoid.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Estimates surface temperature from radiation, mean and max T, and albedo.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Partitions daily radiation into sub-daily shortwave and derives cloud factor and cva.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes net radiation for a sub-daily step including longwave and shortwave terms.

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division with error value if denominator is zero.

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if an array has any non-NaN values.

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sum with 1-based bounds and ignoring sentinel 999999.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Zeros an array in-place.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Computes cumulative thickness.
